headline: SKYX Provides Corporate Update Including an Additional $3.25 Million Investment from Leading Investor and Continued Expansion in Builder Segments
summary: MIAMI, Oct. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SKYX Platforms Corp. (NASDAQ: SKYX) (d/b/a SKYX Technologies) (the “Company” or “SKYX”), a highly disruptive platform technology company with over 100 pending and issued patents globally and over 60 lighting and home décor websites, with a mission to make homes and buildings become safe and smart as the new standard, today provided the following corporate updated on its progress.
